request.description: Get shifts from a company. Admin users will get shifts from all employees.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: oauth2
Added as a part of security scheme: oauth2

request.description: Creates a shift for the current user with the clock_in time of the request and nil clock_out

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: oauth2
Added as a part of security scheme: oauth2

request.description: Updates a shift for the current user with the clock_out time of the request. It will fail if the user wasn't previously clocked in.

item.name:
Get a collection of custom fields.
          Custom fields are fields attached to a specific model,
          and this fields have individual values for each instance of the model

request.description:
Get a collection of custom fields.
          Custom fields are fields attached to a specific model,
          and this fields have individual values for each instance of the model

response.name: Collection of custom fields
